class.name: Sprite
class.description: A node that displays a 2D texture. The texture displayed can be a region from a larger atlas texture, or a frame from a sprite sheet animation.

method.name: get_rect
is_pixel_opaque
method.description: Returns [code]true[/code], if the pixel at the given position is opaque and [code]false[/code] in other case. [b]Note:[/b] It also returns [code]false[/code], if the sprite's texture is [code]null[/code] or if the given position is invalid.
